title: Steel billionaire Sanjeev Gupta hits back at 'ridiculous' critics as he unveils radical shake-up
text:
Entrepreneur Sanjeev Gupta has branded critics "ridiculous" for questioning the finances of his Liberty steel empire, as he unveiled a radical bid to unite it as a single global business.

The Indian-born billionaire insisted his opponents are motivated by jealousy and vowed to be more transparent than ever about the financial health of his business, which he claims is a titan turning over $15bn (£12bn) a year with 30,000 staff and operations in the UK, Europe, Australia and the US.

Mr Gupta is to unite Liberty's 200 operations around the world into a single entity able to produce 18m tonnes of steel annually, which he said will be the world’s eighth largest producer outside of China.
